channel.title: Small evil king change (along with a counter balance)
channel.description:
Evil king needs the following things:
- Alert when all his allies have died (original king only) - once all his allies are dead, the evil king may use any remaining uses of "guards!" to kill people at night
Because this might be too good, I suggest the following counter-measure:
- Once there are 5 or fewer people alive, use of "Allies" by good or neutral king will kill target instead of guarding them
